segments.text: I see the open window above the sink, letting in all that light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and tidy compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman enjoys looking out there while she works.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’d rather be out there than dealing with this kitchen disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight makes the water on the floor glisten, almost like it’s part of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet the garden is her escape from all this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a shame that she’s missing the beauty outside while this happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she takes a break and steps outside soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is the only peaceful thing in this whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
